pages.title: Color Palette
pages.text: The Color Palette is a crafting component needed to craft Colored Palettes $(br)To color a pedestal, the process is a bit unusual, but this gives us a bit more flexibility with how many options for colors we can have.

pages.title: Coloring Explanation
pages.text: Since we have more then the default 16 color options, the system used to pick colors is in-world and a bit more complex.$(br)We use a combination of $(#f00)Red$(), $(#0f0)Green$(), and $(#00f)Blue$() dye to pick our colors. So go out and get a good supply of those colors!
